verses.verse: Then <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4977>Mattan<s%>, and <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashur<s%>, and <S%H3116>Jucal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%>, and <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchiah<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, He that <S%H3427>remaineth<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>: but he that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>; for he shall have his <S%H5315>life<s%> for a <S%H7998>prey<s%>, and shall <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H2425><s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, This <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5414>surely<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>, which shall <S%H3920>take<s%> it.

Therefore the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, We beseech thee, let this <S%H376>man<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: for <S%H3651>thus<s%> he <S%H7503>weakeneth<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, in <S%H1696>speaking<s%> such <S%H1697>words<s%> unto them: for this <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1875>seeketh<s%> not the <S%H7965>welfare<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%>, but the <S%H7451>hurt<s%>. welfare: Heb. peace

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, he is in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>: for the <S%H4428>king<s%> is not he that <S%H3201>can<s%> do any <S%H1697>thing<s%> against you.

Then <S%H3947>took<s%> they <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4428>Hammelech<s%>, that was in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%>: and they let <S%H7971>down<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> with <S%H2256>cords<s%>. And in the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> there was no <S%H4325>water<s%>, but <S%H2916>mire<s%>: so <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H2883>sunk<s%> in the <S%H2916>mire<s%>. of Hammelech: or, of the king

Now when <S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%>, <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> which was in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they had <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>; the <S%H4428>king<s%> then <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>;
<S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

My <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, these <S%H582>men<s%> have done <S%H7489>evil<s%> in all that they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, whom they have <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>; and he is like to <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> <S%H7458>hunger<s%> in the <S%H8478>place<s%> where he is: for there is no more <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>. he is like: Heb. he will die

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> from hence <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H3027>thee<s%>, and take <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> out of the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>, before he <S%H4191>die<s%>. with thee: Heb. in thine hand

So <S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H3027>him<s%>, and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> under the <S%H214>treasury<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> thence <S%H1094>old<s%> cast <S%H5499>clouts<s%> and <S%H1094>old<s%> rotten <S%H4418>rags<s%>, and let them <S%H7971>down<s%> by <S%H2256>cords<s%> into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>.

And <S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H7760>Put<s%> now these <S%H1094>old<s%> cast <S%H5499>clouts<s%> and rotten <S%H4418>rags<s%> under thine <S%H679>armholes<s%> <S%H3027><s%> under the <S%H2256>cords<s%>. And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so.

So they drew <S%H4900>up<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> with <S%H2256>cords<s%>, and took him <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>: and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%>.

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto him into the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3996>entry<s%> that is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, I will <S%H7592>ask<s%> thee a <S%H1697>thing<s%>; <S%H3582>hide<s%> nothing from me. third: or, principal

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>, If I <S%H5046>declare<s%> it unto thee, wilt thou not <S%H4191>surely<s%> put me to <S%H4191>death<s%>? and if I give thee <S%H3289>counsel<s%>, wilt thou not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me?

So <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> <S%H5643>secretly<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, that <S%H6213>made<s%> us this <S%H5315>soul<s%>, I will not put thee to <S%H4191>death<s%>, neither will I <S%H5414>give<s%> thee into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> unto <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; If thou wilt <S%H3318>assuredly<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%>, then thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>, and this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall not be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H2421>live<s%>, and thine <S%H1004>house<s%>:

But if thou wilt not go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%>, then shall this <S%H5892>city<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, and they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and thou shalt not escape <S%H4422>out<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, I am <S%H1672>afraid<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, lest they <S%H5414>deliver<s%> me into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they <S%H5953>mock<s%> me.

But <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, They shall not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee. <S%H8085>Obey<s%>, I beseech thee, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which I <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto thee: so it shall be <S%H3190>well<s%> unto thee, and thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>.
But if thou <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, this is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7200>shewed<s%> me:

And, behold, all the <S%H802>women<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and those women shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Thy <S%H582>friends<s%> <S%H7965><s%> have set thee <S%H5496>on<s%>, and have <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against thee: thy <S%H7272>feet<s%> are <S%H2883>sunk<s%> in the <S%H1206>mire<s%>, and they are turned <S%H5472>away<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>. Thy friends: Heb. Men of thy peace

So they shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> all thy <S%H802>wives<s%> and thy <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>: and thou shalt not escape <S%H4422>out<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, but shalt be <S%H8610>taken<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>: and thou shalt cause this <S%H5892>city<s%> to be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>. thou shalt cause: Heb. thou shalt burn, etc
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, Let no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> of these <S%H1697>words<s%>, and thou shalt not <S%H4191>die<s%>.

But if the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> that I have <S%H1696>talked<s%> with thee, and they <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, <S%H5046>Declare<s%> unto us now what thou hast <S%H1696>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H3582>hide<s%> it not from us, and we will not put thee to <S%H4191>death<s%>; also what the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto thee:

Then thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, I <S%H5307>presented<s%> my <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, that he would not cause me to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3083>Jonathan's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, to <S%H4191>die<s%> there.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H7592>asked<s%> him: and he <S%H5046>told<s%> them according to all these <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%>. So they left off <S%H2790>speaking<s%> with him; for the <S%H1697>matter<s%> was not <S%H8085>perceived<s%>. they: Heb. they were silent from him

So <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%> until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>: and he was there when <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>.
